ygData.subject: Re: Introductions
ygData.msgSnippet: You get 1 additional point of dmg per lvl above the rank for an uncertain number of lvls (is my exp as a lvl 16 wiz)    Shock of ice still does only 38 for me
ygData.messageBody:
You get 1 additional point of dmg per lvl above the rank for an uncertain
number of lvls (is my exp as a lvl 16 wiz) Shock of ice still does only
38 for me but fire bolt does 51

David R. Crowder
Thomcomp, Inc
(610) 834-1120 x341


-----Original Message-----
From: Mark Mazurik [SMTP:mmazurik@...]
Sent: Friday, April 16, 1999 2:29 PM
To: Crowder, David; eq_wizards@onelist.com; WriterDL@...
Subject: RE: [eq_wizards] Re: Introductions

I am formulating an opinion that many of these spells base damage is
tied to
your evocation skill. Ex. I am 8th level with a 45 evocation and
the
firebolt does 45 damage. Coincidence? Maybe. But the lower rank
spells
seem to be creeping up in terms of damage (Evocation/Something?).

Mazurik

-----Original Message-----
From: Crowder, David [mailto:DCrowder@...]
Sent: Friday, April 16, 1999 2:23 PM
To: 'WriterDL@...'; eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Introductions


From: "Crowder, David" <DCrowder@...>

By rank three I am assuming that you mean lvl 8. That is one of the
best
lvls for spells you will definitely need the following:
Shock of ice (34dmg for 30 mana), Fire Bolt(45dmg for 40 mana) be
careful
with the fire bolt as it requires a direct line of sight to hit,
lesser
shielding is a must as we are very vulnerable and this will be your
shield
until lvl 16, resistant skin is good against rat plague disease and
spider
poison.

Hope this helped


-----Original Message-----
From: WriterDL@... [SMTP:WriterDL@...]
Sent: Friday, April 16, 1999 2:02 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Introductions

From: WriterDL@...

Greetings and Good day.

I am Gaedin, a 5th level High Elf Wizard on Veeshan who
spends his
days
wandering around Kelethin sniping at Orc Centurions. I do
actually
have a
question. Could one of you 8+ levelers out there tell me
which Rank
3
scrolls are worth buying?

Many Thanks and drop me a line sometime if you want to go
hunting...
